price: 49. Omoni te, baye wana batatoli ete bango bazali petoa? Kasi Allah nde akopetolaka oyo ye alingi, mpe bakosala bango mabe ata moke te lokola Fatîl.(1)
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yuzakkūna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakkī man yashāu walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
